import React from'react';import'../css/style.css';import StudentContex from'../context/StudentContex';/**
 * @param {Array} grades - A array of test scores from the student.
 * @returns A rendered list of the students grades.
 */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var TestScores=function TestScores(_ref){var grades=_ref.grades;var count=0;var renderlist=grades.map(function(score){count++;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"field",children:"Test ".concat(count,": ").concat(score,"%")});});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"scoreList mt-3 mb-1",children:renderlist});};export default TestScores;
